full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## 01582-240269 Heavy Harrows

### Reference Number
WS4291003389-Doc4298345124

### Amendment Number
0

### Solicitation Number
WS4291003389

### Publication Date
2023-11-20

### Closing Date for Tender
2023-12-06 14:00 EST

The closing time has been amended to 2023-12-04 14:00 EST for submission of required supporting documentation and bid submissions. Any bid submissions made after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

### Expected Contract Start Date
2024-01-24

### Expected Contract End Date
None

## Classification
*21100000 - Agricultural and forestry and landscape machinery and equipment*

## Category
*GD - Government departments*

## Notice Type
* Request for Proposal*

## Procurement Method
* Competitive - Open bidding*

## Selection Criteria
* Lowest Price*

## Trade Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*

## Regions of Delivery
* Alberta*

## Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Entity
Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
K.W. Neatby Building, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario K1Y4X2, Canada

## Contact Information
Ashley Tegart, SPAC/PSPC
ashley.tegart@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Description
For the supply and delivery of a Heavy Harrow in accordance with the Performance Specifications detailed herein to Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada, Beaverlodge, Alberta.

You must submit your bid by 2023-12-04 14:00 EST to be considered responsive. The bid must include all required supporting documentation. Any submissions made after 14:00 EST will be rejected. 

The Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time are to be disregarded. 

Please refer to the notice URL below for more information:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17953348?extsite=MTc5NTMzNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

This tender has been cancelled. 

---

Please note that the text has been condensed
